lead_paragraph: The exhibition “State of Exception/Estado de Excepción” at the Parsons School of Design follows the migrant trail across the treacherous Sonoran Desert in Arizona.
snippet: The exhibition “State of Exception/Estado de Excepción” at the Parsons School of Design follows the migrant trail across the treacherous Sonoran Desert in Arizona....

headline.print_headline: Things They Carried to the End
headline.main: For Migrants Headed North, the Things They Carried to the End
